description: Two important global phenomena are examined in this module: firstly, the rate at which people, images, technology and money flow across national borders, and secondly, the extent to which this helps to bring about a global culture. The module guides students to undertake a careful investigation of the theories of globalisation with particular emphasis on the way that new media technologies contribute to a thriving global civil society. For CNM, FASS and SoC students
title: Media and Globalisation
